property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Light creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) ■ You may untap this creature to change your opponent's creatures attack to this creature or one of your tapped creatures. ■ If this creature is tapped at the start of your opponent's turn, you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 8 or less from your hand into the battle zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, your other creatures can't be chosen. (They can still be attacked and blocked.) ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, you may draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your water creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) ■ Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Darkness creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's creatures gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ At the start of your opponent's turn, if this is your only creature in the battle zone, you lose the game.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ After this creature attacks, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it on the bottom of their deck. Then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ During your opponent's turn, they can't put creatures into the battle zone in any way except by summoning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 6 or less and put it on the bottom of their deck. {SUPER}: Creatures can't attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or another Metallica into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures. ■ Draw a card. {SUPER}: You may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 8 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ You may tap any number of your creatures. ■ Draw a card for each of your tapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may summon this creature by discarding 2 water cards instead of paying its cost. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Draw up to 2 cards. Then discard a card from your hand. {SUPER}: Choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ When this creature is destroyed, put a creature that has power 1000 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. {SUPER}: Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then put a non-evolution darkness creature from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 2 of your shields into your hand. You can't use the shield trigger abilities of those shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, this turn, the next Beat Jockey you summon may cost up to 3 less. It can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Choose a card in the battle zone that costs 5 or less and put it into that owners graveyard. {SUPER}: Destroy all your opponent's creatures that cost 7 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature may cost 1 less to summon for each creature in your mana zone. It can't cost 0 or less. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARDMAN} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature from your other creatures to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature for no cost, you may have that creature battle this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. {SUPER}: You may put a non-evolution nature creature that has power 15000 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone. ■ This creature attacks your opponent each turn if able. ■ While you have 2 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, this creature gets +3000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature attacks you, you may tap this creature to stop the attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Jokers creature from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Light creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) ■ Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, you may choose a creature and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ Labyrinth: If you have more shields than your opponent, this creature gets +3000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.value: ■ Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.
